descr: "Describes the intention of how one or more practitioners intend to deliver care for a particular patient, group or community for a period of time, possibly limited to care for a specific condition or set of conditions."

fields.name: category
fields.descr: "High-level categorization of the type of activity in a care plan."

fields.name: definition
fields.descr: "Identifies the protocol, questionnaire, guideline or other specification the planned activity should be conducted in accordance with."

fields.name: code
fields.descr: "Detailed description of the type of planned activity; e.g. What lab test, what procedure, what kind of encounter."

fields.name: reasonCode
fields.descr: "Provides the rationale that drove the inclusion of this particular activity as part of the plan or the reason why the activity was prohibited."

fields.name: reasonReference
fields.descr: "Provides the health condition(s) that drove the inclusion of this particular activity as part of the plan."

fields.name: goal
fields.descr: "Internal reference that identifies the goals that this activity is intended to contribute towards meeting."

fields.name: status
fields.descr: "Identifies what progress is being made for the specific activity."

fields.name: _status
fields.descr: "Extensions for status"

fields.name: statusReason
fields.descr: "Provides reason why the activity isn't yet started, is on hold, was cancelled, etc."

fields.name: _statusReason
fields.descr: "Extensions for statusReason"

fields.name: prohibited
fields.descr: "If true, indicates that the described activity is one that must NOT be engaged in when following the plan.  If false, indicates that the described activity is one that should be engaged in when following the plan."

fields.name: _prohibited
fields.descr: "Extensions for prohibited"

fields.name: scheduledTiming
fields.descr: "The period, timing or frequency upon which the described activity is to occur."

fields.name: scheduledPeriod
fields.descr: "The period, timing or frequency upon which the described activity is to occur."

fields.name: scheduledString
fields.descr: "The period, timing or frequency upon which the described activity is to occur."

fields.name: _scheduledString
fields.descr: "Extensions for scheduledString"

fields.name: location
fields.descr: "Identifies the facility where the activity will occur; e.g. home, hospital, specific clinic, etc."

fields.name: performer
fields.descr: "Identifies who's expected to be involved in the activity."

fields.name: productCodeableConcept
fields.descr: "Identifies the food, drug or other product to be consumed or supplied in the activity."

fields.name: productReference
fields.descr: "Identifies the food, drug or other product to be consumed or supplied in the activity."

fields.name: dailyAmount
fields.descr: "Identifies the quantity expected to be consumed in a given day."

fields.name: quantity
fields.descr: "Identifies the quantity expected to be supplied, administered or consumed by the subject."

fields.name: description
fields.descr: "This provides a textual description of constraints on the intended activity occurrence, including relation to other activities.  It may also include objectives, pre-conditions and end-conditions.  Finally, it may convey specifics about the activity such as body site, method, route, etc."

fields.name: _description
fields.descr: "Extensions for description"
